org.fluentjdbc.DbContextBulkUpdateBuilder

Packages that use DbContextBulkUpdateBuilder
Package
Description
org.fluentjdbc
Fluent JDBC is a micro ORM - a library to help you generate and execute SQL statements with JDBC.

  • Uses of DbContextBulkUpdateBuilder in org.fluentjdbc

    Methods in org.fluentjdbc that return DbContextBulkUpdateBuilder
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    <T> DbContextBulkUpdateBuilder<T>
    DbContextTable.bulkUpdate(Stream<T> objects)
    Creates a DbContextBulkUpdateBuilder object to fluently generate a UPDATE ... statement for a list of objects.
    DbContextBulkUpdateBuilder<T>
    DbContextBulkUpdateBuilder.setField(String fieldName, Function<T,Object> transformer)
    Adds a function that will be called for each object to get the value for PreparedStatement.setObject(int, Object) for each row in the bulk update to extract the values for the SET fieldName = ?
    DbContextBulkUpdateBuilder<T>
    DbContextBulkUpdateBuilder.where(String field, Function<T,?> value)
    Adds a function that will be called for each object to get the value for PreparedStatement.setObject(int, Object) for each row in the bulk update to extract the values for the WHERE fieldName = ?
